hackathon-description-text: To attend and participate in Geo Hack Day London you will need to register at
hackathon-eligibility:
You must be 18 or over to participate in Geo Hack Day London.
You must be physically present at Geo Hack Day London.
hackathon-requirements: Functioning demos are more powerful than slide decks but you can present your project in any way you think makes sense.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: A trip for 4 to the Emirates Aviation Experience in London with a meal at the Pilot Inn

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Vouchers for the project with the most votes from participants at the hackathon.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We're looking for ideas and projects that are really original and innovative.
How well your application was thought out for users.
How well you present your project.

hackathon-description-header: Geo Hack Day is a unique opportunity to get together with other location enthusiasts to build cool solutions using GIS and other geo data sources and services.
